name: Two Birds: One Stone
description:
Theme:
Our take on the theme of "two" was to make a game in  which you control two characters. In our game, the main character soul gets ripped into two, and they must solve puzzles with their two sides to become whole again.

Story:
One day, Ralph the crow, was wandering about some ruins when they stumbled upon a magic stone. Upon gazing into the stone's mirror like surface their soul was dragged out of their body and taken into the stone. Now Ralph must split their focus between their body and soul.

Can you help Ralph become whole again?

Controls:

WASD - top screen movement

IOPL - bottom screen movement

R - restart the current level

DownKey = pick up blocks and set them down

Space - display controls

Esc - load main menu

This game was made for United Game Jam 2020 hosted on itch.io 
https://itch.io/jam/united-game-jam-2020
The theme was: Two

Game Engine: Unity

Team Name: Peanut Butter Buddies

Members:
Final - Project Manger
Gene Tigner - Artist
Matthew Tigner - Artist
Wander - Designer/Audio
Ranyo - Designer
Jordan Bejar - Programmer
SunnyBun - Programmer

We had no beginners.
